summary: The Cure is a popular English rock band that formed in 1976. Led by singer and guitarist Robert Smith, they started the post-punk and new wave music movements in the UK. Their music got darker with their second album, influencing gothic rock. After their fourth album, they added more pop sounds and became famous worldwide. They've sold over 30 million albums and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2019. Their latest album is coming out in 2024.
title: The Cure
